div.p: This app provides a generic NX-API collector which empowers users to make use of NX-API provided by Nexus 9k and periodically track certain data from 9k switch. It simply takes switch CLI and convert it into NX-API call and provide data which can be saved as a dashboard.
This app provides feature of Splunk custom search command. We have implemented Splunk custom search command called "nxapicollect".

p.b: Below are the steps to use the nxapicollect command. Note that the output of custom search commands is not indexed by default.

ol.li: Provide credentials on setup page of app.

li.p: Go to search option and enter your search in search bar.
You have different option for custom search command:

ul.li: | nxapicollect command="your cli" ("your cli" will use rest endpoints to get credentials for switch)
| nxapicollect command="your cli" device="x.x.x.x" username="username" password="password"
| nxapicollect command="your cli" device="x.x.x.x,y.y.y.y" (Make sure credentials for this devices are already provided through setup page)

li.p: Click on Save As and click on Dashboard Panel to store your result in dashboard.
Enter Dashboard Title. You have to give "report" keyword in giving dashboard title.
You can see your dashboard in Custom reports
